org.jnetpcap.packet
Class PcapRecord

java.lang.Object
  org.jnetpcap.nio.JMemory
      org.jnetpcap.nio.JBuffer
          org.jnetpcap.packet.PcapRecord

public class PcapRecord
extends JBuffer

A raw pcap packet record. The record consists of a single memory segment that has the following data structures; a pcap header followed by packet data: 

 [header][data]
The pcap header length is constant, while the data is not and is determined by the caplen field within the header.

Author:
Mark Bednarczyk, Sly Technologies, Inc.
